permissions.title: Important Safety Notice
permissions.intro: Ralph Desktop runs AI coding assistants in auto-execution mode. This means:
permissions.bullet1: AI can read, create, modify, and delete files in the project directory
permissions.bullet2: AI can run commands automatically (e.g. npm install, git commit)
permissions.bullet3: AI actions will not ask for confirmation one by one
permissions.recommendation1: Only use in project directories you trust
permissions.recommendation2: Ensure the project uses Git for rollback
permissions.recommendation3: Do not use in directories containing sensitive data

gitRepo.title: Git repository required
gitRepo.runtimeReason: Codex detected the directory is not trusted at runtime. Please handle this before continuing.
gitRepo.preflightReason: Codex requires the project directory to be inside a Git repo or explicitly skip the check.
gitRepo.projectNote: Choosing "Initialize Git" creates .git in the project directory. "Skip check" is permanent for this project.

recovery.title: Interrupted tasks detected
recovery.subtitle: {count} tasks were running when the app closed

task.stopConfirm: Are you sure you want to stop? This will immediately terminate execution.

autoInitGit.label: Initialize Git repository
autoInitGit.description: A new Git repository will be created before starting.

autoCommit.label: Auto-commit after each iteration (git commit)
autoCommit.description: Commit message is generated by AI after every iteration.
autoCommit.note: Commits are local only and will not be pushed.

banner.partialMessage: Reached the max iterations. The result is usable but can be refined further.

actions.increaseIterationsPrompt: Enter a new max iterations (current {current}, suggested {suggested})

statusCard.partialMessage: The current result is usable, but there’s room to improve. You can increase iterations to refine, or use it as is.

cliMissing.title: No AI CLI tools detected
cliMissing.bodyLine1: Ralph Desktop requires Claude Code, Codex, or OpenCode CLI to run tasks.
cliMissing.bodyLine2: Please install at least one tool and restart the app.
cliMissing.restartHint: After installation, please restart Ralph Desktop

settings.title: Settings
settings.resetConfirm: Reset permissions confirmation? You will be prompted again on next launch.

notifications.maxIterationsMessage: Reached the max iterations ({iteration}). You can increase iterations to refine, or use the current result.

brainstorm.title: AI Brainstorm
brainstorm.initialQuestion: What do you want to do?

dialogs.deleteProjectConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project?
